title: Enterprise CRM System
description: A custom CRM built to streamline customer interactions and sales pipelines for a large organization.
problem: The sales team was struggling with a generic, off-the-shelf CRM that didn't fit their unique workflow, leading to inefficiencies and lost data.
solution: I developed a bespoke CRM system from the ground up using ASP.NET MVC and Entity Framework. The application was tailored to the company's specific sales pipeline, featuring custom reporting tools and a REST API for integration with other internal systems.
